/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the intersection. The roads are filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day. The trees lining the roads are lush and green, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, showcasing the city's architectural style.
